ns2:li: Maintains visitor access records to the facility where the information system resides (except for those areas within the facility officially designated as publicly accessible); and

ns2:p.#text: Visitor access records include, for example, name/organization of the person visiting, signature of the visitor, form(s) of identification, date of access, time of entry and departure, purpose of visit, and name/organization of person visited.
The organization employs automated mechanisms to facilitate the maintenance and review of access records.
The organization maintains a record of all physical access, both visitor and authorized individuals.
